    • Uses of Buffer in org.vertx.java.core.buffer

      Methods in org.vertx.java.core.buffer that return Buffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Buffer Buffer.appendBuffer(Buffer buff)
      Appends the specified Buffer to the end of the Buffer.
      Buffer Buffer.appendByte(byte b)
      Appends the specified byte to the end of the Buffer.
      Buffer Buffer.appendBytes(byte[] bytes)
      Appends the specified byte[] to the end of the Buffer.
      Buffer Buffer.appendDouble(double d)
      Appends the specified double to the end of the Buffer.
      Buffer Buffer.appendFloat(float f)
      Appends the specified float to the end of the Buffer.
      Buffer Buffer.appendInt(int i)
      Appends the specified int to the end of the Buffer.
      Buffer Buffer.appendLong(long l)
      Appends the specified long to the end of the Buffer.
      Buffer Buffer.appendShort(short s)
      Appends the specified short to the end of the Buffer.The buffer will expand as necessary to accomodate any bytes written.
      Buffer Buffer.appendString(java.lang.String str)
      Appends the specified String str to the end of the Buffer with UTF-8 encoding.
      Buffer Buffer.appendString(java.lang.String str, java.lang.String enc)
      Appends the specified String str to the end of the Buffer with the encoding as specified by enc.
      Buffer Buffer.copy()
      Returns a copy of the entire Buffer.
      Buffer Buffer.copy(int start, int end)
      Returns a copy of a sub-sequence the Buffer starting at position start and ending at position end - 1.
      static Buffer Buffer.create(byte[] bytes)
      Create a new Buffer that contains the contents of the byte[] bytes
      static Buffer Buffer.create(int initialSizeHint)
      Creates a new empty Buffer that is expected to have a size of initialSizeHint after data has been written to it.
      static Buffer Buffer.create(java.lang.String str)
      Create a new Buffer that contains the contents of String str encoded with UTF-8 encoding
      static Buffer Buffer.create(java.lang.String str, java.lang.String enc)
      Create a new Buffer that contains the contents of String str encoded according to the encoding enc
      Buffer Buffer.setBuffer(int pos, Buffer b)
      Sets the bytes at position pos in the Buffer to the value b.
      Buffer Buffer.setByte(int pos, byte b)
      Sets the byte at position pos in the Buffer to the value b.
      Buffer Buffer.setBytes(int pos, byte[] b)
      Sets the bytes at position pos in the Buffer to the value b.
      Buffer Buffer.setBytes(int pos, java.nio.ByteBuffer b)
      Sets the bytes at position pos in the Buffer to the value b.
      Buffer Buffer.setBytes(int pos, java.lang.String str)
      Sets the bytes at position pos in the Buffer to the value of str endoded in UTF-8.
      Buffer Buffer.setBytes(int pos, java.lang.String str, java.lang.String enc)
      Sets the bytes at position pos in the Buffer to the value of str encoded in encoding enc.
      Buffer Buffer.setDouble(int pos, double d)
      Sets the double at position pos in the Buffer to the value i.
      Buffer Buffer.setFloat(int pos, float f)
      Sets the float at position pos in the Buffer to the value i.
      Buffer Buffer.setInt(int pos, int i)
      Sets the int at position pos in the Buffer to the value i.
      Buffer Buffer.setLong(int pos, long l)
      Sets the long at position pos in the Buffer to the value i.
      Buffer Buffer.setShort(int pos, short s)
      Sets the short at position pos in the Buffer to the value i.

    • Uses of Buffer in org.vertx.java.core.file

      Methods in org.vertx.java.core.file that return types with arguments of type Buffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future<Buffer> AsyncFile.read(Buffer buffer, int offset, int position, int length)
      Reads length bytes of data from the file at position position in the file, asynchronously.
      Deferred<Buffer> AsyncFile.readDeferred(Buffer buffer, int offset, int position, int length)
      The same as AsyncFile.read(org.vertx.java.core.buffer.Buffer, int, int, int) but the read does not start until the Deferred.execute() method is called on the Deferred instance returned by this method.
      Future<Buffer> FileSystem.readFile(java.lang.String path)
      Reads the entire file as represented by the path path as a Buffer, asynchronously.
      Deferred<Buffer> FileSystem.readFileDeferred(java.lang.String path)
      The same as FileSystem.readFile(String) but the read does not start until the Deferred.execute() method is called on the Deferred instance returned by this method.
      Methods in org.vertx.java.core.file with parameters of type Buffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future<Buffer> AsyncFile.read(Buffer buffer, int offset, int position, int length)
      Reads length bytes of data from the file at position position in the file, asynchronously.
      Deferred<Buffer> AsyncFile.readDeferred(Buffer buffer, int offset, int position, int length)
      The same as AsyncFile.read(org.vertx.java.core.buffer.Buffer, int, int, int) but the read does not start until the Deferred.execute() method is called on the Deferred instance returned by this method.
      Future<java.lang.Void> AsyncFile.write(Buffer buffer, int position)
      Write a Buffer to the file at position position in the file, asynchronously.
      Deferred<java.lang.Void> AsyncFile.writeDeferred(Buffer buffer, int position)
      The same as AsyncFile.write(org.vertx.java.core.buffer.Buffer, int) but the write does not start until the Deferred.execute() method is called on the Deferred instance returned by this method.
      Future<java.lang.Void> FileSystem.writeFile(java.lang.String path, Buffer data)
      Creates the file, and writes the specified Buffer data to the file represented by the path path, asynchronously.
      Deferred<java.lang.Void> FileSystem.writeFileDeferred(java.lang.String path, Buffer data)
      The same as FileSystem.writeFile(String, Buffer) but the write does not start until the Deferred.execute() method is called on the Deferred instance returned by this method.
